source.query: SELECT 'ApiDB' as PROJECT_ID, enas.SOURCE_ID, enas.A_COUNT, enas.C_COUNT, enas.G_COUNT, enas.T_COUNT, enas.OTHER_COUNT, enas.LENGTH, 'Ncbi dbEST' as DBEST_NAME, 'Other Apicomplexan (no Cmp,Pbfvy,Tg)' as ORGANISM, 5794 as NCBI_TAX_ID, 'Other Apicomplexan ESTs' as EXTERNAL_DB_NAME, CAST(9999 as NUMBER(5)) as LIBRARY_ID FROM dots.ExternalNASequence enas WHERE enas.taxon_id in ('88165', '88839', '88899')
